paper: Do LLMs Signal When They’re Right_ Evidence from Neuron Agreement

differences.summary: Unsubstantiated p-value claim and missing statistical testing details
differences.why_impacts_score: Undermines validity of correlation claims, reducing technical rigor

evidence.baseline_quote: Correlational evidence (Figure 2) but no formal derivation mapping activations to entropy/self-certainty.
evidence.final_quote: The claim of 'p-value less than 0.05' lacks reporting of sample sizes, exact p-values, or tests.

differences.summary: Missing citation for GPT-4 calibration assertion
differences.why_impacts_score: Weakens grounding and credibility of background claims, lowering clarity

evidence.baseline_quote: Clear definitions and diagrams with comprehensive tables; some parameter specifics are underreported.
evidence.final_quote: Introduction references GPT-4 calibration issues without a corresponding citation; No direct evidence found.

differences.summary: Cross-table numerical inconsistencies between main text and appendix
differences.why_impacts_score: Inconsistent results compromise reproducibility and comparative claims

evidence.baseline_quote: Clear definitions and diagrams with comprehensive tables.
evidence.final_quote: Several accuracies differ between Table 1 and Appendix Table 3, undermining consistency.

differences.summary: Technical Quality score decreased due to reporting and inconsistency issues

evidence.baseline_quote: Technical Quality (10): 6 — Solid correlational evidence but lacks formal analysis; some details missing.
evidence.final_quote: Technical Quality (10): 5 — Missing statistical test details and inconsistencies between tables reduce rigor.

differences.summary: Clarity score decreased due to conflicting numbers across tables
differences.why_impacts_score: Conflicting figures reduce clarity and trust in reporting

evidence.baseline_quote: Clarity (10): 7 — Clear definitions and diagrams with comprehensive tables.
evidence.final_quote: Clarity (10): 6 — Clear definitions, but numbers conflict across tables.
